profileAlternative.name: sneha simhadri
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Data Analyst at Apple
profileAlternative.summary:
Results-driven professional with 7+ years of extensive experience working on Unica Suite & SQL, with complete knowledge of campaign life cycle

Skilled at performing extensive deep dives on data using sql to determine patterns and anomalies.

Extensive experience working as a Unica Administrator using utilities like server admin, listener start stop, cleanup, trigger etc

Proficient in using advanced Unica capabilities including table catalogs, custom macros, templates and
derived fields

Experienced in multiple Unica modules like campaign, marketing operations, detect, optimize and e-message

Environmental Summary:
 Campaign Management Tools: Unica Campaign, Marketing operations, Detect, Optimize
 Scripting languages: SAS, shell scripting
 Reporting tools: IBM Cognos, Micro Strategy, Tableau
 Databases: Teradata, Oracle, SQL Server
 Operating Systems: Windows, UNIX
 Others: Teradata SQL Assistant, TOAD, FileZilla, Putty

educations.title: Birla Institute of Technology & Science, Pilani

given.text: It was an absolute pleasure working with Matthew on my latest job placement. He was proactive in reaching out to me and the client throughout the entire process. He goes above and beyond what is necessary in helping understand all the options and making an informed decision. I would strongly recommend working with Matthew and looking forward to working together in the future. See less
